sentences.en: An array of wave probes can be used as a directional antenna.
sentences.cn: 排成阵列的测波仪,可作为波浪传播方向的感触器.
把收音机的天线拉到最长。

sentences.en: He erected a television antenna on the roof.
sentences.cn: 他在房顶立了电视天线.

sentences.en: He had marvelous antenna, he was nervous.
sentences.cn: 他的触觉实在灵敏得惊人.

sentences.en: In our village, there is an antenna on every roof for receiving TV signals.
sentences.cn: 在我们村里, 每家房顶上都有天线接收电视信号.

sentences.en: In radiocommunications, the radiation in a lobe of a directional antenna.
sentences.cn: 在无线通信技术中, 定向天线以某一波瓣辐射的电磁能.

sentences.en: Our television receives well since we had a new antenna put on.
sentences.cn: 自从安装了新天线以来,我们的电视接收良好.

sentences.en: Our TV receives well since we had a new antenna put on.
sentences.cn: 自从安装了新天线以来，我们的电视接收良好。

sentences.en: Power is being delivered along the wires which lead into the antenna.
sentences.cn: 沿着通往天线的导线有功率传输着.

sentences.en: Reception improved because of the new antenna.
sentences.cn: 接受效果因有新天线而得到改善.

sentences.en: The minister was praised for his acute political antennae (= ability to understand complicated political situations) .
sentences.cn: 这位部长以政治触觉敏锐而为人称道。

sentences.en: The reception is very poor. Let me adjust the antenna.
sentences.cn: 接收效果太差了. 让我来调一下天线.

sentences.en: The workman fixed the antenna to the roof of the house.
sentences.cn: 工人把天线固定在房顶上.

sentences.en: These waves struek the antenna of a receiving station.
sentences.cn: 这些波碰到了接收台天线.

sentences.en: They erected a television antenna on the roof.
sentences.cn: 他们在屋顶上架起了电视天线.

sentences.en: You'd get better TV reception if you had an outside antenna.
sentences.cn: 如果你接上室外天线,你的电视机的接收效果会更好.

phrases.tran_cn: 电缆电视；公用天线电视
回路天线；环形天线；框形天线

trans.tran_en: one of two long thin parts on an insect’s head, that it uses to feel things
